data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether and when Close, Next and Prev buttons are displayed in the tab control's header.

data.name: XtraTabControlHeaderLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the tab headers.

data.name: XtraTabControlHeaderOrientation
data.value: Gets or sets the orientation of the tab headers.

data.name: XtraTabControlImages
data.value: Gets or sets the source of the images that can be displayed within page headers.

data.name: XtraTabControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to the settings which control the tab control's look and feel.

data.name: XtraTabControlMaxTabPageWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum width of tab headers.

data.name: XtraTabControlMultiLine
data.value: Gets or sets whether more than one row of tab headers can be displayed.

data.name: XtraTabControlPageImagePosition
data.value: Gets or sets the alignment of the image displayed within the page header.

data.name: XtraTabControlPaintStyleName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the paint style applied to the tab control.

data.name: XtraTabControlRightToLeftLayout
data.value: Gets or sets whether right-to-left mirror placement is turned on.

data.name: XtraTabControlSelectedTabPage
data.value: Gets or sets the currently selected tab page.

data.name: XtraTabControlShowHeaderFocus
data.value: Gets or sets whether a focus frame is displayed around the selected page header.

data.name: XtraTabControlShowTabHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether the page headers are displayed.

data.name: XtraTabControlShowToolTips
data.value: Gets or sets whether the tab control can display tooltips.

data.name: XtraTabControlTabMiddleClickFiringMode
data.value: Gets or sets if and when the XtraTabControl.TabMiddleClick event fires.

data.name: XtraTabControlTabPages
data.value: Provides access to the tab control's page collection.

data.name: XtraTabControlTabPageWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the default width for all tab page headers.

data.name: XtraTabControlToolTipController
data.value: Gets or sets the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and content of the hints displayed for a tab control.

data.name: XtraTabPageAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current XtraTabPage's icon should be painted in the page's foreground color.

data.name: XtraTabPageAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the tab page's appearance.

data.name: XtraTabPageBackColor
data.value: Gets or sets the background color of the tab page's client region.

data.name: XtraTabPageCollectionItem
data.value: Gets the tab page at the specified position within the collection.

data.name: XtraTabPageCollectionTabControl
data.value: Gets the tab control which displays the pages in this collection.

data.name: XtraTabPageForeColor
data.value: Gets or sets the foreground color of the tab page's client region.

data.name: XtraTabPageImage
data.value: Gets or sets the image displayed within the tab page's header.

data.name: XtraTabPageImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed within the tab page's header.

data.name: XtraTabPageImagePadding
data.value: Gets or sets padding for the image displayed in the page's header.

data.name: XtraTabPageMaxTabPageWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum width of the current tab header.

data.name: XtraTabPagePageEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether a tab page can be selected.

data.name: XtraTabPagePageVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the tab page is visible.

data.name: XtraTabPageShowCloseButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the page contains a Close button.

data.name: XtraTabPageSuperTip
data.value: Gets or sets a SuperToolTip for the current tab page's header.

data.name: XtraTabPageTabPageWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the header width for the current tab page.

data.name: XtraTabPageText
data.value: Gets or sets the tab page's caption.

data.name: XtraTabPageTooltip
data.value: Gets or sets a regular tooltip for the tab page.

data.name: XtraTabPageTooltipIconType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the tooltip icon to display in a regular tooltip.

data.name: XtraTabPageTooltipTitle
data.value: Gets or sets a regular tooltip's title.

data.name: ZoomTrackBarControlButtonClick
data.value: Occurs after the ZoomTrackBar control's pressed button has been released.

data.name: ZoomTrackBarControlButtonPressed
data.value: Occurs immediately after the ZoomTrackBar control's button has been pressed.

data.name: ZoomTrackBarControlProperties
data.value: Gets an object which contains properties, methods and events specific to the ZoomTrackBarControl control.
